Reviews.Content: bid hotel thru priceline sites rate hotel 3star tripadvisor rate hotel exterior looks old step different story lobby bright clean spacious parking 20 per valet good experience upgraded us tokyo executive room surprise even booked thru priceline apparently two groups tour guess checked us checked really late night thus rooms taken got upgrade room good bed comfy nice decor given paid 75 executive room downtown la good deal sure would say thing standard room due fact hotel fully booked night problem enough hot water thing would complain water shower head strong water wasnt even warm managed finish shower turn hot water gone called front desk ask help allowed shower spa charge spa unlimited hot water enjoy also used sauna experience ok staff friendly except one lady put smile tried best make happy neighbourhood good felt safe late night chinese love japanese food area lot choices overall good hotel would consider going back thru priceline

Reviews.Title: “Good for going cheap and 10x better than Motel6”
Reviews.Author: California_Wine
Reviews.Content: stayed king size single room top floor corner never heard anyone nice size clean bathroom tv channel selections hopefully player also included attentive staff good room service across street line great asian restaurants

Reviews.Title: “Tries to punch above its weight - not a 3*”

Reviews.Content: new miyako strong 80s inside rooms really clean comfortable even bidet toilet seat japanese came show la convention center bit far walk easily drive park fact hotel much cheaper something nearby paid nite huge convention mind shows much youll probably save also hotel area east trendy club area west nearer downtown great location safe japanese place across street asian youll probably get ticket complimentary continental breakfast downstairs cafe take 5 take advantage bit heavy taste croissant etc morning coffee using japanese leaves fine little delicious

Reviews.Title: “Not fancy, but clean and quiet”

Reviews.Content: hotel bad money room clean staff friendly young female staying alone business didnt feel unsafe worst thing rooms well lit upon entering lobby smelled like fish however rooms smell staff quite friendly bit language barrier many available desk tourist attractions area free close major overall would stay hotel hotels area much expensive

Reviews.Title: “Heart of Little Tokyo-Close to Amtrak Station”

Reviews.Content: need want stay downtown near little tokyo cant beat business meetings nearby choice since didnt want bother car impressed room staff booked online room called day arrival confirm reservation hotel staff ended reservation day arrival case phone calls reservation came nervous front desk staff polite also advised resolve issue common areas hotel clean room spotless small furniture clearly new hotel room spacious wellappointed snack bar lobby quite selection drinks sandwiches snacks open long hours fun sushi shops right around corner kind neighborhood feel unsafe rates also extremely reasonable

Reviews.Title: “What a nice surprise! Would stay again...”

Reviews.Content: travel time worst experience regarding service hotel nice cute good rooms problem scary safe area standing front hotel restaurants across street walk around block covered homeless people safe also parking joke dont get tickets every time cant leave garage asked call hotel room said even sheet hotel asked fill stating paying daily rate 14 parking said go back room go lobby get ticket get garage way garage connected walk narrow corridor get dark never ever stay even spoke manager said thats able put show parking open gate like many hotels rooms bed rock liked

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel Comfortable Stay Friendly and Helpful Staff”
Reviews.Author: OriginalGtoBill
Reviews.Content: stayed miyako weekend feb 2007 booked room orbitz mistake charged upgrade room available orbitz finally talked hotel giving room wanted tokyo king want stay book orbitz cheap tickets hotel nice way room clean staff pleasant onsite dining facilities except coffee shop lobby miyako convenient las better restaurants numerous quick dining places nearby little tokyo however least wont took shuttle lax cost 16 ready leave asked hotel get seat shuttle bus back airport unfortunately need service must make request day dont cab ride airport costs 42 overall miyako decent hotel thats fairly close downtown la may stay
